comments.author: jones.rodney@gmail.com
comments.creator: jones.rodney@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0

In Firefox 4, I went to www.metropcs.com to login. I logged in and my account was displayed. When I updated to Firefox 5 beta, went to metropcs.com and logged in, the screen that should have displayed my acct was blank.

I am currently using my Dell laptop w/Windows XP SP3.  The same thing happened on my Dell Desktop Computer earlier today (Windows 7 sp1). I could view my acct screen fine in Firefox 4, but couldn't when updated to Firefox 5 beta.  I can view my account screen in both IE 8 (on laptop)  and IE9 (on my desktop computer w/Win7).  Please check into this.  I dislike having to use IE just to check  this account.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.https://login.metropcs.com/sso/login.aspx  I then login.
2.https://login.metropcs.com/access/oblix/apps/webgate/bin/webgate.dll   Screen is blank.

I don't know how you will reproduce this without my username and password for my metropcs acct.


Expected Results:  
Displayed my account information

comments.author: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.text:
You should contact the site owner in such a case.
There is nothing that we can do without a testcase and we don't have one because a login is needed.
comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
